column4: something here about high cpu usage being normal for glxgears... http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Glxgears_is_not_a_Benchmark FWIW i have the same graphics card as you and also get 100% cpu usage...
dragging windows around also gives high cpu
whats your fps in glxgears then?
i dont know, cant remember the switch to show fps ;)
glxgears shows its fps in console
just type glxgears in a console and you'll see it
not by default - it needs a switch, to do so, and I can't remember it ;)
pretty sure i've never used a switch
ah you're right, sorry that was the case in the old one - i get around 3300 fps, with that vid card, athlon X2 3800+ and 1GB ram
i personally wouldn't worry about it, unless its affecting other things...
I started checking this stuff out after getting some poor performance in the kde4 effects, like their impl. of wobbly windows and stuff
well i'm running gnome and stock compiz - so i can't really help you other than to let you know that it all works fine for me..
5,5 fps 116 in score in the sanctuary demo benchmark! doesn't sound right at all
i can't help you at all with that, I'm sorry...
